languages.text: {n}Рука нашаривает запечатанный футляр, в котором покоятся карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}. Время гадать на крови мертвецов — она откроет мне имя их нечестивого господина.{/n}

{n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рука нашаривает запечатанный футляр, в котором покоятся карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}. Время гадать на крови мертвецов — она откроет мне имя их нечестивого господина.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

{n}My hand finds the sealed case in which His Tarot cards reside. It is time for divination, but His omens will not appear in the blood of the dead, only in the pulsing blood that carries the last heartbeat.{/n}

{n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

{n}My hand finds the sealed case in which His Tarot cards reside. It is time for divination, but His omens will not appear in the blood of the dead, only in the pulsing blood that carries the last heartbeat.{/n}

{n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

{n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

{n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Meine Hand findet die versiegelte Schatulle mit den Karten {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Seines Tarots{/g}. Es wird Zeit für eine Prophetie im Blut des Tote – es wird mir den Namen ihres unheiligen Meisters offenbaren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Meine Hand findet das versiegelte Kästchen mit Seinen Tarotkarten. Es ist Zeit für eine Prophetie, doch Seine Omen erscheinen nicht im Blut der Toten, nur in pulsierendem Blut, das den letzten Atemzug noch in sich trägt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mi mano encuentra la caja sellada en la que residen las cartas de {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g}. Es momento de una adivinación a partir de la sangre de los muertos: se me revelará el nombre de su impío maestro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mi mano encuentra la caja sellada en la que residen las cartas de Su tarot. Es el momento de una adivinación, pero Sus presagios no aparecen en la sangre de los muertos, solo en la sangre palpitante que extiende el último latido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}我が手は封印されたケースを探し当てる。そこには、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}主のタロット{/g}カードが入っている。死者の血で占う時が来た。彼らの不浄の主人の名を明らかにするだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あの方のタロットカードが入った、封のされたケースが手に触れる。ディビネーションをする頃合いだが、あの方の予言は死者の血には現れず、最後の鼓動を感じた活きの良い血にのみ現れるのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我的手伸向了密封的盒子，里面装着{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}。是时候用死者的鲜血进行占卜了，祂的预兆会揭示邪恶主宰的名字。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我的手伸向了密封的盒子，里面装着祂的圣牌。占卜的时候到了，但祂的预兆不会显现在死者的血迹之中，只会浮现在联结着最后一次心跳的鲜血之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ma main trouve le paquet scellé abritant {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Ses cartes de tarot{/g}. Il est temps de lire dans le sang des morts. Cette divination me révélera le nom de leur maître impie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ma main trouve le paquet scellé abritant Ses cartes de tarot. Il est temps de procéder à une divination, mais Ses présages n'apparaîtront pas dans le sang des morts, seulement dans celui qui jaillit d'un ultime battement de cœur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elim, {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}İmparator'un Tarotu{/g} kartlarının bulunduğu mühürlü kasaya gidiyor. Ölülerin kanında kehanet okuma vakti geldi. Kehanet bana uğursuz efendilerinin adını bahşedecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My hand finds the sealed case in which {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} cards reside. It is time for a divination in the blood of the dead — it will reveal to me the name of their unholy master.{/n}
